title: Avoidable mortality in England and Wales
summary: Data on avoidable mortality in England and Wales for 2014. Data are based on a revised definition of avoidable mortality for all persons and a new avoidable mortality definition for children and young people. These definitions were developed following a public consultation in 2015.
metaDescription: Deaths from causes that are considered avoidable in the presence of timely and effective healthcare or public health interventions (avoidable mortality).
